item.description:
Charged with overseeing Israel's war on terror—both Palestinian and Jewish—the head of the Shin Bet, Israel's secret service, is present at the crossroad of every decision made. For the first time ever, six former heads of the agency agree to share their insights and reflect publicly on their actions and decisions. Directed by Dror Moreh (Sharon), the documentary The Gatekeepers offers an exclusive account of the sum of their successes and failures. It validates the reasons that each man individually and the six as a group came to reconsider their hard-line positions and advocate a conciliatory approach toward their enemies based on a two-state solution. Official Web Site.  Academy Award nominee for Best Documentary Feature.   100% Rotten Tomatoes (top critics).

Note:  The showtime is 4.10pm and tickets are on sale now at https://tickets.landmarktheatres.com/(S(e5zfvus2rusw0a3k0f2edpau))/Ticketing.aspx?TheatreID=231&MovieID=14374&ShowDate=3/10/2013&ScheduleID=116385.

We'll gather in the lobby afterwards and go to Cambridge Brewing Company for a post-movie discussion.
item.name: The Gatekeepers
